scene_description_enriched: A man in a blue robe and a black hat kneels on a grassy ground dotted with small flowers. He is looking upwards with his hands clasped in prayer. A scroll unfurls above him, bearing an inscription in Latin. To his right, a lion lies on the ground, also looking upwards. In the foreground, a shield is displayed, divided vertically into white and orange halves, each bearing a black heraldic charge resembling a rose or thistle. The background is a patterned tapestry of diamonds in gold, blue, and pink.
